aka: Five and a Half Love Stories in an Apartment in Vilnius

cast.name: 维达斯·帕特凯维奇 Vidas Petkevicius
艾莉森·奥利弗 Alison Oliver

this_title: Penkios su puse meilės istorijos, nutikusios viename Vilniaus bute
trans_title: Five and a Half Love Stories in an Apartment in Vilnius
introduction: Five guests experience a crisis of love in an AirBnB in Vilnius; unaware of the stories that have transpired within the same walls and under the same bedsheets. Between each, the quiet cleaning lady, Jolanta, arrives to clean away the debris, while her own silent love story unfolds.
foreign_title: Penkios su puse meilės istorijos, nutikusios viename Vilniaus bute
